example.text: The Biden admin will end Title 42 tomorrow without a working plan in place to keep AZ communities and migrants safe. They had years to prepare for this, failed to do so, and now Arizona will bear the brunt of this crisis. We're pushing for solutions to keep AZ safe. [[url]]

AZ border communities shoulder the burden of our border and immigration crisis. I'm working on an immigration framework with [[user]] to deliver lasting solutions to secure the border, protect our border communities, and ensure migrants are treated fairly and humanely. [[url]]

And so much more. I was also honored to travel all across the state to have conversations with Arizonans about the issues that matter most, and detail the historic investments I?ve secured for our state this year.

AZ border communities shoulder the burden of our border and immigration crisis. I'm working on an immigration framework with [[user]] to deliver lasting solutions to secure the border, protect our border communities, and ensure migrants are treated fairly and humanely. [[url]]

We met with the US Ambassador to Mexico Ken Salazar last week ahead of Title 42’s termination to prepare for the expected influx of migrants and discuss enhancing coordination between CBP and their Mexican counterparts. [[url]] [[url]]
We’re introducing bipartisan legislation to improve Border Patrol staffing and combat smugglers’ use of drones along the Arizona border. [[url]]
